articles.title: IHH Healthcare submits proposal to buy Ramsay Sime Darby for RM5.67b - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (March 22): IHH Healthcare Bhd has submitted a confidential, conditional, non-binding and indicative proposal to acquire 100% of Ramsay Sime Darby Health Care Sdn Bhd for RM5.67 billion.Ramsay Sime Darby is an Asian joint venture equally owned by…
articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR (March 22): IHH Healthcare Bhd has submitted a confidential, conditional, non-binding and indicative proposal to acquire 100% of Ramsay Sime Darby Health Care Sdn Bhd for RM5.67 billion.… [+872 chars]

articles.title: Uber Eats Japan creates “QR Pjs” to promote late night delivery in new work via Special Australia - Campaign Brief Asia
articles.description: Uber Eats offer the widest late night delivery coverage in Japan. To drive awareness of this unique service and boost the brand’s popularity, it has partnered with Special Australia to create “QR PJs”.

articles.title: Barbie Hsu and new husband DJ Koo finally meet in person after over 20 years - AsiaOne
articles.description: TAIPEI - South Korean musician DJ Koo has been reunited with his new wife, Taiwanese actress Barbie Hsu, for the first time in more than 20 years. Koo, whose real name is Koo Jun-yup, was spotted by the Taiwanese media leaving his quarantine hotel around midn…
